Camden.Giovanni's Room Bookstore: Giovanni's Room Bookstore has been called the oldest gay bookstore in America and the "center of gay Philly". Founded in 1973 in Philadelphia, Giovanni's Room Bookstore is named after James Baldwin's gay-themed novel Giovanni's Room. In April 2014 the store's owner of 38 years, Ed Hermance, announced his retirement plans, which included selling both the business and its two buildings.
